item.title: Open default mail client on windows
item.description: In this article I will introduce 3 ways to open mail client on windows: Open a default mail client on windows10 In this article I will introduce 3 ways to open mail client on windows: mailto: mapi regestry Comparision mailto is a protocal to open a mail client which is surpported by most clients, but no attachment can be specifed. MAPI is suited for MicroSoft Office development, so it is good surpported by Micosoft Ofice suites.
